name: generate_flash_cards
description: Submit generated flash cards. Each card has a front (question/term) and back (answer/definition).

cards.description: Array of flash cards to generate

front.description: The front of the card - a term, question, or prompt (max 15 words)

back.description: The back of the card - the answer, definition, or explanation (max 50 words)

topic_summary.description: A brief 1-2 sentence summary of what these flash cards cover
